sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import {useSelector} from 'react-redux' function Header() { const totalCapacity = useSelector(state=>state.metrics.totalCapacity); const headCount = useSelector(state=>state.metrics.headCount); const averageAttendance = useSelector(state=>state.metrics.averageAttendance); const averageCPH = useSelector(state=>state.metrics.averageCPH); const averageUptime = useSelector(state=>state.metrics.averageUptime); return (

Your Company Metrics

Metrics Description
Total Capacity {totalCapacity} Cases (average associate cases per hour * average uptime percentage) * 8 hour day
Total Headcount {headCount} Workers Sums of total employees scheduled
Average Attendance {averageAttendance} % Attendance Average attendance of all employees
Average Cases Per Hour {averageCPH} Cases Per Hour Average cases per hour of all employees
Average Uptime {averageUptime} % Uptime Average uptime of all employees
); } export default Header;
